title: SCP-CN-3000
content:

@@ @@

[[div class="scp-rate-wrapper"]]
[[include :scp-wiki:info:start]]
**SCP-CN-3000:** Eternal Glory to All Nodes
**Authors:** [[*user DouglasLiu]] feat. [[*user DrStse]], Author's Page **[[[https://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/douglasliu-author-page | here]]]**
**Translators:** [[*user vxeov]] and [[*user Sazanami]]

All character avatars are drawn by [[*user DrStse]].

The image of Mt. Qomolangma Broadcasting Node is created by Stse and Doug; the main part is made with Blender by Doug.

All other materials (icons, font for eigenvectors) are made by Doug.

[[collapsible show="▼ Author's Note" hide="▲ Author's Note"]]
The story of Yu Nuoda and Shi Hengxin reflects my original idea for this article.
The idea has been kept inside my head for a couple of years tbh, and I've never thought of using it here.
[[/collapsible]]

[[include :scp-wiki:info:end]]
[[/div]]
